IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_fact_absence_all
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

    T1.AbsenceStartDate,
    T1.AbsenceEndDate,
    T1.Hours AS AbsenceHours,
    T1.EmployeeID AS StaffNumber,
    T6.WorkScheduleRule,
    T1.AbsenceType,
    T1.SicknessGroup,
    CASE 
        WHEN AbsenceType = 'Sickness' THEN 'Sickness'
        WHEN AbsenceType LIKE '%Annual%' THEN 'Annual'
        ElSE '0'
    END AS AbsenceGroup,
    CASE    
        WHEN T6.WorkDayHours = 0 THEN T1.HOURS
        WHEN T6.WorkDayHours = '' THEN T1.HOURS
        WHEN T6.WorkDayHours IS NULL THEN T1.HOURS
        ELSE T1.Hours/T6.WorkDayHours
    END AS Leave,
	case datepart(dw,AbsenceStartDate)
		when 2 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 3 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 4 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 5 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		when 6 then T6.WorkDayHours/7.4
		else null
	end as LeaveONS,
    T6.WorkDayHours,
    T5.Description PayBand,
    T5.PSGroupCode AS PSGroup,
    T3.Description AS PersonnelArea,
    T4.Description AS PersonnelSubArea,
    T1.[AbsenceID] AS SicknessID,
	T1.[Days] as SicknessLength,
    CASE 
        WHEN CAST([Days] AS FLOAT) > 20.0 then 'long-term'
		ELSE 'short-term'
    END AS SicknessLengthType

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_absence_dim] T1 
LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_record_fact] T2 ON T1.EmployeeID=T2.EmployeeID AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_personnel_area_dim] T3 ON T3.PersonnelAreaID=T2.PersonnelAreaID AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_personnel_sub_area_dim] T4 ON T4.PersonnelSubAreaID=T2.PersonnelSubAreaID AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_payband_dim] T5 ON T5.PayBandID=T2.PayBandID AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_work_schedule_dim] T6 ON T6.WorkScheduleID = T2.WorkScheduleID AND T6.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'

GO
